name: Parmesan
description: Crumbly and rough, with salty, nutty, spicy and slightly floral notes.

name: Pecorino
description: Crumbly and firm, with aromatic, pungent flavors and soft spices.

name: Gruyere
description: Dense and flaky, with sweet, slightly salty, slightly earthy notes.

name: Cheddar
description: Crumbly with sharp, bold flavors and notes of toasted hazelnuts and whiskey.

name: Gouda
description: Smooth and rich, with intense caramel flavor like browned butter and toffee.

name: Munster
description: Smooth, soft, and supple, with mild and sweet flavor of roasted nuts.

name: Brie
description: Silky and creamy, with a light, buttery, slightly salty flavor.

name: Camembert
description: Velvety, thick, and sticky, with notes of hay, umami, earth and grass.

name: Gorgonzola
description: Soft yet crumbly, with competing flavors of buttery and piquant.

name: Feta
description: Brittle and grainy, with a tangy, salty, pungent and intense flavor.

name: Ricotta
description: Thick, creamy, and spreadable, with a mild, fresh, and slightly sweet flavor.

name: Mozzarella
description: Creamy and elastic, with a mild, milky and slightly acidic flavor.
